input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
Samsung Galaxy S3 Original OEM 2100mAh Rechargeable Battery

Product features:
Genuine Samsung branded product
This battery is NFC-enabled
Battery Type: Li-ion, Voltage: 3.8V, Capacity: 2100mAh, Item model number: EB-L1G6LLA
2100mAh battery allows you to store power necessary to keep your device charged throughout the day
input_text.Response A: This battery is for Samsung Galaxy S3. It has a 2100mAh battery which is enough to keep your device charged throughout the day. It is genuine Samsung branded product. It is NFC-enabled.
input_text.Response B: This is an original Samsung Galaxy S3 OEM 2100mAh rechargeable battery. It is a Li-ion battery with a voltage of 3.8V and a capacity of 2100mAh. The battery is NFC-enabled.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: Yes, it did everything it was supposed to do and no errors.
label_annotations.factors_b: yes, it lost a point for repeating the battery power.
